Thanks for testing this out. For me it also works in Ubuntu 15.10 and chrome 48 (in virtualbox) but with a fresh clean Ubuntu 15.10 hardware install **and** in Windows 10 with chrome Version 48.0.2564.103 (64-bit) I see no interactivity tooltips and cannot select anything. Could this be related to canvas/graphics/hardware acceleration related issues?
